titleStmt.title: A List of Linguistic Features of Damascus Arabic

sourceDesc.p: This is an original digital text

cit.note: Most commonly dialects show reflexes of CA man.
cit.quote: Who is this man? – He is my friend
Whose car is this? – This is our car. It’s small but it’s good.
